holders.name: Ryuko
holders.main_power: Wind Dragon, Water Dragon, Thunder Dragon

holders.name: Dragon Bug
holders.main_power: Wind Dragon, Water Dragon, Fire Dragon and Lucky Charm

akumatized.name: The Bubbler
goals: To get rid of all adults
akumatized.quote: Let's get this party started!

akumatized.name: Mr. Pigeon
goals: To save the pigeons of Paris
To turn Paris into a paradise for pigeons by turning all humans into pigeons
akumatized.quote: Perfect timing, hootie ho! We're ready to greet them, aren't we? They're going to fall right into my trap. It won't be long before you get your Miraculous, friend.
power_and_abilities: Pigeon control and turning people into evil pigeons

akumatized.name: Stormy Weather
goals: To get revenge on everybody who turned her down
akumatized.quote: Hahahaha! I am Stormy Weather. The only weather girl who always gets the forecast right! And unfortunately for you, there's a freak icy front moving in right now!

akumatized.name: Timebreaker
goals: To go back in time to save a family heirloom from being broken
To wants to learn the secrets that Marinette is keeping from them so that they can be friends again
akumatized.quote: One and a half minutes. You won't be able to stop me where I'm going, Ladybug

akumatized.name: Copycat
goals: To replace Cat Noir and win Ladybug's heart
akumatized.quote: Don't mind me. Just stealing this painting. Go about your business.

akumatized.name: The Pharaoh
goals: To perform an ancient ritual to revive Queen Nefertiti

akumatized.name: Lady Wifi
goals: To reveal the secret identity of Ladybug
To assist Puppeteer in getting Ladybug's Miraculous
To get revenge on Adrien, later Felix for his video
To wants to learn the secrets that Marinette is keeping from them so that they can be friends again
akumatized.quote: I am Lady Wifi, revealer of the truth!

akumatized.name: The Evillustrator
goals: To get revenge on Chloe
akumatized.quote: So, I just came by to ask you, it, uh, well, it's my birthday today, and, uh, would you wanna come to my party?

akumatized.name: Rogercop
goals: To punish the mayor for firing him
akumatized.quote: If no one speaks up, I'll put you all under arrest! Where is your father?

akumatized.name: Dark Cupid
goals: To spread hate in all of Paris
akumatized.quote: I can help you crush Ladybug, but you must give me her Miraculous in return.

akumatized.name: Horrificator
goals: To make people feel her fear
To wants to learn the secrets that Marinette is keeping from them so that they can be friends again

akumatized.name: Darkblade
goals: To take back Paris for the original Darkblade
akumatized.quote: Henceforth, my flag shalt fly over thy kingdom! Bourgeois, pathetic knave, come hither and do battle!

akumatized.name: The Mime
goals: To get revenge on Chris for stealing his part in a performance

akumatized.name: Princess Fragrance
goals: To be with Prince Ali
To get revenge on Adrien, later Felix for his video
To wants to learn the secrets that Marinette is keeping from them so that they can be friends again
akumatized.quote: My prince, my prince, smell the fragrance of my eternal love!

akumatized.name: Stoneheart
goals: To get revenge on the people who wronged him
To be with Mylene
power_and_abilities: Control over an army of rock-golems (after the akuma isn't purified)

akumatized.name: Animan
goals: To teach Kim a lesson

akumatized.name: Simon Says
goals: To prove he can hypnotize Gabriel Agreste
akumatized.quote: Welcome to another exciting hour of 'The Challenge'! Good evening again from Simon Says. Viewers, I've kept my promise. Here's Gabriel!

akumatized.name: Pixelator
goals: To capture Jagged Stone in one of his pictures
akumatized.quote: Look into the lens.

akumatized.name: Guitar Villain
goals: To make everyone dance and get revenge on XY for insulting him
akumatized.quote: Rockin' Riff, baby!

akumatized.name: Kung Food
goals: To get revenge on Chloé for sabotaging his soup and making him lose the World's Greatest Chef contest
akumatized.quote: You want to taste Kung Food's soup. Everybody become my servants, and Kung Food become 'World's Greatest Chef'! Hahahaha!
power_and_abilities: Mind control (over anyone who ate his sabotaged soup)

akumatized.name: Gamer
goals: To be the greatest gamer in Paris
akumatized.quote: Welcome to Miraculous All-Star Brawl! If you win, I'll set you free. You, and all of them. But if you lose...

akumatized.name: Reflekta
goals: To be noticed
To wants to learn the secrets that Marinette is keeping from them so that they can be friends again
To wants to drown herself in her own guilt and for her classmates to go back to treating Rose like a normal person
akumatized.quote: Nobody's ever noticed me! But those days are over! But from now on, everybody will notice me because everybody will look like me! Time to get a new look!

akumatized.name: The Puppeteer
goals: To get Ladybug and Cat Noir's Dolls
akumatized.quote: I want... those... dolls!

akumatized.name: Vanisher
goals: To get revenge on Chloé for pretending she didn't exist
akumatized.quote: Just because you can see me, doesn't mean you'll defeat me Ladybug!

akumatized.name: Antibug
goals: To get revenge on Ladybug for betraying her fan
akumatized.quote: Wrong, super wrong. I am Antibug!

akumatized.name: Volpina
goals: To get revenge on Ladybug for exposing her as a liar
akumatized.quote: I am Volpina, the only superhero Paris needs.

akumatized.name: Santa Claws
goals: To punish everyone for not respecting the Christmas spirit
akumatized.quote: You think you can get away with making fun of me? You think you can get away with accusing me? I am Santa Claws! I'm a rebel with a cause! I'll punish and give you a fright! Have a horrible Christmas night.

akumatized.name: The Collector
goals: To replace his lost inspirational book with a new one, as well as lead Ladybug and Cat Noir astray from his identity as Hawk Moth
akumatized.quote: Since the book that used to fill my life is gone, I'm going to use your life to fill up this new one!

akumatized.name: Prime Queen
goals: To get Ladybug and Cat Noir to admit they're in love so she can get the highest ratings
akumatized.quote: Tonight, Ladybug and Cat Noir disappointed all their loyal fans by refusing to admit their love for one another. I've prepared some trials just to see how far they're prepared to keep the truth hidden from us.

akumatized.name: Despair Bear
goals: To get Chloé to pay for being mean
akumatized.quote: You've been very naughty, Chloékins. And Despair Bear is not proud of you. The time has come to make you pay!

akumatized.name: Riposte
goals: To get revenge on Adrien for her losing to him in a fencing match
akumatized.quote: Allow me to explain the rules to you... you're not allowed to call it quits at any time! Adrien is mine! I will defeat you. Both of you! I am the best fencer!

akumatized.name: Befana
goals: To punish her granddaughter, Marinette for not wanting to spend time with her
akumatized.quote: La Befana comes at night, on her shaky broom in flight. She gives candy to those who are dandy.

akumatized.name: Robostus
goals: To steal the Miraculous and become human
To destroy all humans
akumatized.quote: From now on, I am Robostus. And we shall be together one hundred percent of the time. Forever!

akumatized.name: Dark Owl
goals: To become a superhero
To get the Miraculous
akumatized.quote: And if anyone should be 'tempt to come and save the animals, beware! It is all rig! Liquid nitrogen will automatically douse the feet of the Eiffel Tower, freezing them to -700 degree, and making them more fragile than glass! They will collapse! And the bus will flatten our cute kitten friend!

akumatized.name: Gigantitan
goals: To eat a lollipop
akumatized.quote: Lollipop!

akumatized.name: Glaciator
goals: To get Marinette to find true love from his ice cream

akumatized.name: Sapotis
goals: To cause mischief
akumatized.quote: Rock n' roll!

akumatized.name: Gorizilla
goals: To keep a close watch on Adrien

akumatized.name: Captain Hardrock
goals: To steal Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous
akumatized.quote: Your mom has weighed anchor, me lad, I'm Captain Hardrock and today Paris's timbers are about to be shivered by my cannons. Westward ho, Liberty next stop, Jagged Stone at the Eiffel Tower. Soon, there will only be one concert in Paris only one Music Festival. We will destroy all the others. Now, get to your instruments and rock those decibels!

akumatized.name: Frightningale
goals: To turn Paris into one big music video
akumatized.quote: I'm Frightningale from here on out, Forever and ever, there's no doubt! And if you stand in my way, There'll be a price to pay!

akumatized.name: Syren
goals: To create an undersea kingdom for herself and Kim
akumatized.quote: Yes, Kim! You'll be my Prince, and we'll rule this underwater city together, forever!

akumatized.name: Zombizou
goals: To have people to 'feel the love'.
akumatized.quote: I took care of your father, Chloé. Show yourself! Then, Ladybug and Cat Noir? I'm coming for you. Mwah! Unless, of course, my sweethearts get hold of you first; because very soon, the whole city will be hot on your heels!

akumatized.name: Frozer
goals: To turn Paris into his own personal ice rink

akumatized.name: Style Queen
goals: To get revenge on Gabriel Agreste
To get revenge on everyone who made a fun of her, especially on Senti Alec for embarrassing her on live television
akumatized.quote: Well then. If fashion-disaster daddy isn't here, I'll just have to settle for Agreste Junior! You're fired!

akumatized.name: Troublemaker
goals: To cause problems for everyone else

akumatized.name: Reverser
goals: To get revenge on Nathaniel for destroying his notebook and Marinette for convincing him to step out of his comfort zone, only to be disappointed
akumatized.quote: Reversion!

akumatized.name: Anansi
goals: To show how dangerous the world is to Alya

akumatized.name: Malediktator
goals: To prove to his daughter that he isn't powerless
To want to the citizens of Paris to go along with his construction project without protest
akumatized.quote: By the power invested in me, I declare you all... MY SLAVES!!!

akumatized.name: Sandboy
goals: To bring nightmares to life
akumatized.quote: The Sandboy just checked in. Now nightmares can begin.
power_and_abilities: Power nullification (as long as it's a fear)

akumatized.name: Catalyst
goals: To assist Hawk Moth in taking Ladybug and Cat Noir's miraculous
akumatized.quote: Nothing's more delightful than leading them to believe that they actually have a chance of winning when their future has already been decided!

akumatized.name: Animaestro
goals: To people to recognize him as a big shot
power_and_abilities: Various superpowers (depending on the form he takes)

akumatized.name: Bakerix
goals: To punish people for not doing things the old-fashioned way
akumatized.quote: That's not how it's done!

akumatized.name: Backwarder
goals: To steal time by setting people in time backwards
akumatized.quote: There you are again, you ghastly bug! Once I've touched you, all I have to do is wait for you to transform back!

akumatized.name: Weredad
goals: To protect his daughter from heartbreak
akumatized.quote: How dare you come back after what you've done?

akumatized.name: Silencer
goals: Get Bob Roth to tell the truth on television
akumatized.quote: You’re the most extraordinary girl, Marinette. Clear as a musical note and as sincere as a melody. You’re the music that’s been playing inside my head since the day we first met. I won’t let anything happen to you.

akumatized.name: Party Crasher
goals: To get revenge on Adrien for lying to him about not being allowed to have friends over and for not being invited to Adrien's party
akumatized.quote: Idiot! You can't get me! I can read your every dance step! Disco!
power_and_abilities: Control over his disco ball gauntlets

akumatized.name: Christmaster
goals: To get his Christmas present early
akumatized.quote: You were tricked! That's Cat Noir dressed up as Santa Claus, not the other way around! You're such babies!

akumatized.name: Kwamibuster
goals: To get the kwamis

akumatized.name: Feast
goals: To sate its unyielding hunger by feasting on all of the Miraculouses

akumatized.name: Ikari Gozen
goals: To punish Kagami after she disobeys her by participating in the Friendship Day games
akumatized.quote: You'll never catch me! I'm Ikari Gozen. As elusive as the wind, as powerful as the flood, as swift as lightning!

akumatized.name: Desperada
goals: To punish Jagged Stone for firing her and having the gall to try replacing her
akumatized.quote: In that case, you'll be my first choice too! I never miss a musical note. Vivica ALWAYS hits her targets!

akumatized.name: Startrain
goals: To become an astronaut and explore the galaxy with everyone on board the train
akumatized.quote: Why? Now I have a hundred percent chance of traveling the universe! And I get to take you with me, too! Isn't this fantastic?

akumatized.name: Cat Blanc
goals: To take Ladybug's miraculous
akumatized.quote: I'm not Cat Noir anymore. I'm Cat Blanc

akumatized.name: Truth
goals: To learn the secret that Marinette is keeping from him

akumatized.name: Lies
goals: To get rid the world from lies

akumatized.name: Furious Fu
goals: To take back the walking stick that Su-Han rudely took from him and make Su-Han apologize to his wife for causing her distress
akumatized.quote: Oh so this is your silly little plan. I know what you gonna do.

akumatized.name: Sole Crusher
goals: To step over Chloé and show her she can be at her level and even better
akumatized.quote: The student has become the master, Chloé, and now, I'm going to crush you!
power_and_abilities: Absorbing people by stomp or kick on them

akumatized.name: Queen Banana
goals: To get revenge on Miss Bustier's class for removing her from the movie Terrificator and on Zoé for taking her role as the main character
akumatized.quote: You'll have to come out sometime, Ladybug, especially if you don't wanna see my monkey make a banana smoothie out of your kitty!
power_and_abilities: Wields a banana gun that turns people into bananas

akumatized.name: Queen Wasp
goals: To be exceptional
To get Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculous
akumatized.quote: So, who's exceptional now, then? Them… or me?

akumatized.name: Rena Rage
goals: To beat Carapace to prove that he is 'a flyweight'

akumatized.name: Shell Shock
goals: To be with Rena Rouge to love him again

akumatized.name: Chameleon
goals: To have another chance of defeating Ladybug
akumatized.quote: You're right, I'm Chameleon. You're getting better at this, Ladybug. Which is a good thing. It'll make this fight all the more interesting.

akumatized.name: Oni-Chan
goals: To keep Lila away from Adrien
akumatized.quote: I will protect you from anyone who tries to harm you. I'll protect you from Lila.

akumatized.name: Miraculer
goals: To get Chloe to play with her again
akumatized.quote: I'm Miraculer now! I've stolen Cat Noir and Ladybug's superpowers! Do you want Ladybug's? Then you can be Ladybug, and I'll be Cat Noir! For real! Just like we've always dreamed of!

akumatized.name: Timetagger
goals: To steal Ladybug and Cat Noir's Miraculouses and return the Miraculouses to the Future Hawk Moth before they can become adults
akumatized.quote: If you don't give me your Miraculous, I'll send everyone into the past.

akumatized.name: Heart Hunter
goals: To devour all the love in Paris so that no one could enjoy it when they couldn't
akumatized.quote: And for dessert, the cat! I'm sure he's very tasty.

akumatized.name: Oblivio
goals: To make people forget their embarrassing moment of being caught playing Super Penguino by their classmates
akumatized.quote: You remember your BFF Oblivio, don't you? Don't tell us you've forgotten us. Ha ha ha ha!

akumatized.name: Miracle Queen
goals: To get revenge against Ladybug after she refuses to lend her the Bee Miraculous, despite her genuine desire to help
akumatized.quote: You were once Ladybug and Cat Noir's minions, but from now on, you will be Miracle Queen's royal guard!

akumatized.name: Rocketeer
goals: To get revenge against Cat Noir for flirting with his girlfriend, Alya
akumatized.quote: You're not my Enemy Adrien, Chat Noir is!

akumatized.name: Wishmaker
goals: Make Everyone's Childhood Wish come True!
akumatized.quote: From now on, I will only be who I wanna be, and thanks to me, everyone will finally be able to do, they have always wanted!
power_and_abilities: Turning people into their childhood dreams

akumatized.name: Simple Man
goals: Make this world Simpler
akumatized.quote: Finally something I unserstand!

akumatized.name: Qilin
goals: Punish who put her on Hand-Cuffs

akumatized.name: Ephemeral
goals: Get Ladybug's miraculous to bring back his Mother

akumatized.name: Psychomedian
goals: To make everyone take him seriously
akumatized.quote: Trust me my friend, I will wipe their smiles from their faces

akumatized.name: Risk
goals: Ride bicycle without his parents stopping him

amokatized.name: Light Eye
power_and_ability: Immobilizing anyone using its light beams

amokatized.name: Reflekdoll
power_and_ability: Transforming people into replicas of Reflekta
